### [Padding Modes](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmode/init(_:)#Padding-Modes)

[`init(rawValue: UInt32)`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmode/init(rawvalue:))[`var rawValue: UInt32`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmode/rawvalue)[`var BNNSPaddingModeConstant: BNNSPaddingMode`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmodeconstant)A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area with a specified constant.[`var BNNSPaddingModeReflect: BNNSPaddingMode`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmodereflect)A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an odd-symmetric pattern.[`var BNNSPaddingModeSymmetric: BNNSPaddingMode`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmodesymmetric)A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an even-symmetric pattern.
